sen.j: 神名は、他の二柱と同様に本来は「穂」に因むものと考えられ、誕生時の説話に因んで「火」の字が宛てられたか、逆に「火」の字が宛てられたことから誕生時の説話が生まれたと考えられる。
sen.e: It is believed that his name was originally derived from the Chinese character '穂' (an ear of a grain) as well as his two brother gods, and then the character '火' (fire) was assigned to his name according to this birth story, or on the contrary, the birth story was created after people started to use the character '火' for his name.
